name: BADBOIDZ
description:
A 2.5D 80s inspired puzzle game, BADBOIDZ. Control the ship and transmit your movement to the BADBOIDZ. Guide your BADBOIDZ to the portal to win but watch out for the traps along the way!

UNIVERSITY OF CHESTER PROJECT DETAILS

The game was built for the Global Game Jam 2018 to meet the theme of Transmission. The project was developed in 48 hours with staff, current students and alumni. The University of Chester runs several game jams throughout the year to allow students to mix between year groups and put their skills to the test

CONTROLS

  • W = Up 
  • A = Left
  • S = Down
  • D = Right

REQUIREMENTS

  • Windows PC

TEAM MEMBERS

  • Lee Beever (Staff)
  • Serban Pop (Staff)
  • James Sillet (Alumni)
  • 1 x Level 6 Student
  • 2 x Level 5 Students

COURSE DETAILS

The work presented here is that of our students. Although the page is run by the University of Chester, views in the games do not necessarily represent those of the University of Chester.
